TopicTitle: Ask a stupid question, Get a stupid answer back.

Articles.Content:
Houses are caves built in panic out of handfuls of mud and clay.

Are "chicken" and "children" past participles?

No, they are animals.

How do I find an angle?

Try to look on the table, under  the bed, and in every place you could lose it.

Wait... Is thegle angle?

No. Thegle is an Angel.

When the Millenium Falcon landed in side a worm that was inside an asteroid, how was there air pressure and why was it damp, also why was it full gravity and how did the Mynocks fly and how did they get in there?

The gravitational constant was extremely high at that location, so even the tiny wormsteroid had a normal gravity.
Also, for that reason the asteroid atmospheres were very extended, so they were floating in the air cloud.

Why do they playcards have no "elevens" and "dozens"? They could be hexadecimal.

they just dislike math

Why do I drink water with bubbles?

Because Bubbles is your friend the Chimpanzee.

How do you surf a tidal wave?

Open google and search "Tidal wave" 

Why is negativity?

It's alternative positivity.

Why do the nucleons consist of quark rather than cheese?

Because the Twins like Quark but not cheese.

How many old Sci Fi shows are there?

Enough that the Zip-o-tron's combobulator fried.

Why is old sci-fi more fiction than science?

Because  other old sci-fi we call documentary.

Were the statues in Old Valyria covered with dracon manure?

I wanna say- Yesss.

Was that their bombing division?

Yes, when they were dividing and bombing.

Is the dragon back a hot seat?

Only if you can win cash.

How many Kerbals needed to play Croquet?

7, one for each letter.

What do we use to cut the cheesecake?

We cut the knife with the cheesecake.

How far could i throw a pair of pancakes?

Depends on wind.

What does know John Snow?

Snow man is an island.

What is the worst movie you have ever seen?

I can't even spell its title, so disgusting it was.

What if revert the Milky Way rotation.

It will make us speak backwards

Why is it raining?

Ask Castamere.

What if a wardrobe in Hogwarts is a portal to Narnia?

Then the Ice Witch has got competition.

Why won't they make "The Magicians Nephew"? It was a really good book.

They just finished restoring London after the Nevers. Let them have a rest.

Why does Liver Pool city have such a strange name?

Because without a strange name you wouldn't be able to talk about it

Why is 2^2?
